overview:
## Return Value

 An autoreleased [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance or the received image.

## Discussion

The gain map image can be obtained by creating a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance from `NSURL`/`NSData` and setting the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImageOption/auxiliaryHDRGainMap] option set to `@YES`.

If the gain map [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance doesn’t have the needed [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/properties] metadata, the received image will be returned as-is.

# applyingGainMap(_:)

**Instance Method**

Create an image that applies a gain map Core Image image to the received Core Image image.

## Declaration

```swift
func applyingGainMap(_ gainmap: CIImage) -> CIImage
```

## Return Value

 An autoreleased [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance or the received image.

## Discussion

The gain map image can be obtained by creating a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance from `NSURL`/`NSData` and setting the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImageOption/auxiliaryHDRGainMap] option set to `@YES`.

If the gain map [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance doesn’t have the needed [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/properties] metadata, the received image will be returned as-is.

## Instance Methods

- **applyingGainMap(_:headroom:)**: Create an image that applies a gain map Core Image image with a specified headroom to the received Core Image image.
